reviews.reviewText: the tile was a little costly but it`s worth it ,had no problem using it at all . great tile ,.
reviews.title: tile

reviews.name: G-Floor Levant RaceDay Peel and Stick Tile with PSA, 24" x 24", Absolute White, 10pc
reviews.reviewText:
These tiles are excellent with tow caveats:
1) the tiles are not EXACTLY the same sizes. They are very close but the laying is not perfect. You must make small adjustments. OTOH, no one who has seen our installation has found a single error. Over-all, it looks great.
2) DO NOT short-cut the installation in any way.
a) clean the concrete and fill ANY cracks.
b) etch the concrete
c) put a bonding agent on the concrete
d) lay the tile being very careful to butt the edges tightly.
e) seal the finished tiles.

If you do not short-cut any of the above steps, you will have an excellent result. Skipping any step and all bets are off.
reviews.title: Do it right!

reviews.name: G-Floor Levant RaceDay Peel and Stick Tile with PSA, 24" x 24", Absolute White, 10pc
reviews.reviewText: This product went on the floor of new garage for Shelby GT 500 Mustang. The floor went down extremely well and looks great. Would like to review the product in about a year to see how it looks.
reviews.title: Great product for DIY
